title: Squarespace Template Helper
name: squarespace-template-helper
description: A structured workflow for customizing JavaScript and CSS on Squarespace templates without Developer mode.

scripts.docs: jsdoc source/js/ -r -R README.md -P package.json -t node_modules/jsdoc-oblivion/template -c node_modules/jsdoc-oblivion/template/jsdoc.conf.json -d docs
scripts.postinstall: git clone https://github.com/jquery/jquery.git lib/jquery && cd lib/jquery && npm install && grunt custom:-deprecated,-effects,-effects/Tween,-effects/animatedSelector,-css,-css/addGetHookIf,-css/adjustCSS,-css/curCSS,-css/hiddenVisibleSelectors,-css/showHide,-css/support,-css/var/cssExpand,-css/var/getStyles,-css/var/isHidden,-css/var/rmargin,-css/var/rnumnonpx,-css/var/swap,-dimensions,-offset,-wrap,-exports/amd,-event/alias,-core/ready
